byline.original: By WINNIE HU and JAMES C. McKINLEY Jr

abstract: Justice Darcel D Clark, associate justice of New York State Supreme Court Appellate Division, is selected by local Democratic leaders to succeed Bronx District Attorney Robert T Johnson; Clark, who has no Republican challengers yet for election in November, is poised to become first woman to serve as top prosecutor in borough.
lead_paragraph: Justice Darcel D. Clark of the State Supreme Court was nominated for district attorney in her native borough, decades after leaving the housing project she grew up in.

headline.main: Giving Up the Bench in Hopes of Bringing Justice to the Bronx
headline.print_headline: Giving Up the Bench in Hopes of Bringing Justice to the Bronx

snippet: Justice Darcel D. Clark of the State Supreme Court was nominated for district attorney in her native borough, decades after leaving the housing project she grew up in.
